Stone Shape (W4 Tran): Reshapes touched medium-sized stone
Stoneskin (W4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc up to 1 hr
Suggestion (W2 Ench): R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 8 hr
Sunbeam (W6 Evoc): 60' line inflicts 6d8 HP radiant and blindness for 1 rd (Constitution half HP only) for conc up to 1 min
Sunburst (W8 Evoc): R150' 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP and blindness (Constitution half HP only) for 1 min
Symbol (W7 Abju): Inscribes touched w/a permanent glyph that inflicts harmful magic effects
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (W1 Ench): R30' Target ROFL (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Telekinesis (W5 Tran): R60' Self may mentally move a 1000 lb object 30'/rd (Strength neg) for conc up to 10 min
Telepathy (W8 Evoc): Self may communicate mentally with a willing target for 1 dy
Teleport (W7 Conj): R10' Target object or self and 8 allies teleport any distance
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides access to similar circles for 1 rd
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3' x 1" force disk floats 3' high 20' behind self, holding 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
Thunderwave (W1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Time Stop (W9 Tran): Self gains 1d4+1 turns (affecting another creature or moving more than 1000' away ends)
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
True Polymorph (W9 Tran): R30' Transforms target creature or object (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
True Seeing (W6 Divi): Touched gains 120' truesight, sees magically concealed doors, and can see into the Ethereal Plane for 1 hr
True Strike (W0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): R60' Invisible force (AC 10; 1 HP; Strength 2) moves 15'/rd and performs simple tasks for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Vampiric Touch (W3 Necr): Touched suffers 3d6 HP and self regains half for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Wall Of Fire (W4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20'x1' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) w/in 10' of chosen side for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Force (W5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for conc up to 10 min
Wall Of Ice (W6 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x1' panels (AC 12; 30 HP) that inflict 10d6 HP cold (Dexterity half) initially and, if broken, 5d6 HP cold to passers (Constitution half) for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +2d6 HP initially, +1d6 HP to passers]
Wall Of Stone (W5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for conc up to 10 min
Water Breathing (W3 Tran): R30' 10 targets may breathe underwater for 1 dy [R]
Web (W2 Conj): R60' 20' cube restrains creatures (Dexterity neg, Strength frees) for conc up to 1 hr; burning inflicts 2d4 HP fire
Weird (W9 Illu): R120' 30' radius inflicts frightened and 4d10 HP psychic/rd (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Wish (W9 Conj): Alters reality with few limits
Witch Bolt (W1 Evoc): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 1d12 HP lightning/rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d12 HP initial]
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: May recover 5 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Illusion Savant: May copy illusion spells into spellbook for half cost
Illusory Self: May use Reaction to cause a foe miss 1/short rest
Improved Minor Illusion: Knows Minor Illusion cantrip; effects include both a sound and an image
Malleable Illusions: May modify self illusions throughout duration
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Notes
Validation Errors:
Fighter-Feinting Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
Fighter-Lunging Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
